globalData.courseTitle: Ethical Decision-Making and the Art of Speaking Up
globalData.welcomeNote:
Welcome!

This course will have sound, which will be indicated by an icon on the screen.

Please take a moment to make sure your speakers are turned on.
globalData.disclaimerText:
All information provided is of a general nature and is not intended to address the circumstances of any particular individual or entity. Although we endeavor to provide accurate and timely information, there can be no guarantee that such information is accurate as of the date it is received or that it will continue to be accurate in the future. No one should act upon such information without appropriate professional advice after a thorough examination of the particular situation. The information contained within is current as of:

April 2020
